Posts.Content: Jun 18, 2011 11:41PM Danni1 wrote: Jenn,  I too just made the decision to stop chemo.  It stopped working and the cancer has spreal to my liver. The side effects from this last round are horrible. My mouth is so full of sores and thrush that I can only eat bland soft food.  The oncologist agreed that stopping and just healing was the best option.  So I plan to heal my body and mouth and just enjoy the time I have left.  They estimate 2 to 4 months and I choose quality of life over quantity.  I respect your decision and hope you have a great summer with your family.  Hope we can both be our best for however long we have left.
Posts.Title: Liver Done jleigh PizzaDad
